name: Cloud Shinobi
description:
Endless runner where you are a shinobi running on clouds from a cloud monster.

Collect Hearts to fill powerup meter.

Collect Skulls for points.

Avoid the Bombs, they let the cloud monster catch up. Use the powerup to push him back.

To Jump, Press Space.

To use powerup, Press Q.

The game is won if you acquired 50 points. 

If the Cloud Monster catches up to you, you will lose.

Press Escape at any time to stop.
